title: Brooch And Box, ca. 1880
medium: (Brooch) Gold (Box) red leather, blue velvet, white satin
creditline: Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes
description: (A)Brooch with a bar surmounted by pointed ornament of Greek Key and leaf design, below the bar are 7 pendant balls and rods in four lengths.  (B)The box is designed to hold the set (with earrings 1946-50-38 a,b) covered in red leather, lined with blue velvet and white satin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Brooch And Box, ca. 1880.
ca. 1880. (Brooch) Gold (Box) red leather, blue velvet, white satin. Gift of the estate and in memory of Robert B. Noyes. 1946-50-37-a,b.
